label: 信長記
説明文: Ōta Gyūichi's Chronicle of Nobunaga (Shinchōki) records the deeds of Oda Nobunaga during the years he was the paramount power in Japan, between 1568, when he entered Kyoto, and his death in 1582.#[article]Sugisaki Yumi. Ōta Gyūichi and the Compilation of the Chronicle of Nobunaga (Shinchōki).
